reviews.content: Works but has a white rectangle background.
We could do with an iOS 13 update

No funciona en iOS 14.4 en un A9. 
Ojalá se actualice ya que es un muy buen ajuste  ??

4x2 shows a white outline where the curved edges are.
4x1 is a complete rectangle (no curved edges)
